tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Anju Hazari is absolutely outstanding gynecologist! 
We started consulting her in April, 2020 during my seventh month pregnancy and delivered our baby via C section on July 9, 2020. Due to Covid, she suggested we do video consulting as much as possible to avoid risk. However, for physical examination she called us to a clinic which was near my house. She never made us wait for any appointments and she is very punctual. She guided us step by step throughout my pregnancy and post delivery as well. She heard our concerns very patiently. She made us undergo countless BP checks, Sugar checks and blood test ( towards the end we were tierd :) ) but today we realise how important these tests were in order to have a healthy baby and we are very grateful for her guidance. Doctor Anju is detail oriented and extremely meticulous in recording every issue or concern raised by me during pregnancy and post pregnancy. After delivery she has constantly followed up on my health and baby's health. I completely trust her judgement.
To sum up, in my experience she is an excellent doctor because she is always available, polite,extremely patient, accurate guidance, constant follow ups on WA and phone,
reply_text: Thank you Shefali for such an elaborate feedback

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: After reading positive reviews, we chose Dr Anju Hazari as our primary gynaecologist for pregnancy care and delivery of our first baby. She helped us throughout our pregnancy journey by providing able guidance. She is very meticulous in her work and made sure I underwent timely tests/scans to rule out any complications and alter course of medications wherever needed. During the delivery which was a C-section, she was a calming influence and helped ease my anxiety. She even helped with post operative care i.e support with lactation and exercises to help get back in shape. Really want to thank doctor for making my pregnancy journey healthy, safe and overall positive experience.
reply_text: Thanks Pooja for an elaborate feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Anju Hazari Mam in Surya Hospital as soon I got to know about my pregnancy in home checkup via google as it was nearest to me. Dr Anju Mam is very friendly soft spoken and she tells everything in well elaborated manner..In my pregnancy I had thyroid and diabetes due to which some of the complications risen.. In that manner she also make me understand the complications can risen in birth..but with the help of Mam I controlled my diabetes very well..while I was near my due date she helped me in my natural vaginal birth and with the help of Dr Anju Mam Surya Team with the help of GOD and of course with the help of my parents husband and family ..I successfully delivered my Baby girl on 2nd May..Dr Anju Mam supported me throughout my pregnancy journey like friends she kept me motivated and she made her available every time. I thank her for all the support‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anju Hajari is a perfect blend of responsibility and care. 
She gives a patient hearing to your problems. She first understands and comprehends your issue with complete detailing and then suggests the medical course of action. I would say discussing my problem with her itself gave me lot of confidence that my problem will be addressed with utmost expertise and will be resolved. She is easily approachable, always there for you any hour of the day to address any concerns. All my apprehensions and worries regarding the surgery were explained and addressed patiently by Dr. Anju. 
The dedication and compassion with which you treat your patients is more effective than any medicine! 
Thank you doctor for taking care of your patients so delicately.

review:
When we met the Doctor , I was having severe body pain and headache , she after checking immediately diagnosed the reason and post taste same problem was detected which she had explained during the first meeting.
I feel the way she explained me about my illness and friendliness, I became very confident and post surgery I am doing perfect.

review:
Dr Anju not just treated me as a patient but more like a family. It was so easy to talk to her and she explained the treatment as if it was a video clip. Easy to understand and in just few days I was completely healed. Needless to say that even the follow ups didn‚Äôt last long and today I am without any complaints. 
Happy to be in safe hands and found a hard working and really efficient doctor in today‚Äôs era.
